thread.section_title: BURG TRANSLATIONS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BURG TRANSLATIONS | burgtranslations.com
thread.title: Teresa

author: Teresa
title: Teresa
text: My colleagues recommended Burg to me; I ended up choosing them for a project based on their competitive price. The project was translation of a website in English into Spanish, Korean, Simplified Chinese and Arabic. The translations were excellent (according to our outside reviewers), the project manager was always on top of everything and communication between Burg and our website design vendor went well.
